      • Movie

        public Movie(java.lang.String title,
             java.lang.String director,
             java.lang.String duration,
             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cast,
             Type type,
             java.lang.String startDate,
             java.lang.String endDate,
             java.lang.String movieAbstract,
             java.lang.String classification)
        Create a new movie instance
        Parameters:
        title - Title of movie
        director - Name of director
        duration - Duration of movie in minutes
        cast - List of cast
        type - Type of movie
        startDate - First day of showing
        endDate - Last day of showing
        movieAbstract - Short write up/description about the movie
        classification - PG/NC16/M18/R21

      • showMovieListings

        public boolean showMovieListings()

        Returns:
